“Terrin Finch: Psychic Detective” is a story driven, 2D, point-and-click style, puzzle game (of which you’ll  be seeing the demo version for now). You play as Terrin Finch– a "psychic" detective– and his partner Winter as they seek to crack their latest case: the mysterious disappearance of a group of researchers.  This story is told through exploration, problem solving, and good old-fashioned sleuthing as the player and characters alike slowly uncover more and more about what’s going on– and what they need to do to save everyone involved before things get out of hand.
